title: Senior mjukvaruutvecklare inom inbyggda system
description:
Ansök nu


Etteplan är ett ledande ingenjörsföretag som formar framtidens industrier. Vi är över 4000 teknikspecialister som brinner för teknik och människor. Tillsammans formar vi framtidens innovationer och utveckling inom en global affärsmiljö.


Hos oss får du möjlighet att bygga vidare på din expertis i en miljö där din erfarenhet värdesätts och där du kan bidra till att forma framtidens försvarslösningar. Du blir en del av ett starkt nätverk av specialister och samarbetar med både svenska och internationella aktörer. Här får du inte bara fortsätta göra skillnad – du får också växa professionellt i takt med att tekniken och behoven utvecklas.


Vi söker engagerade medarbetare som vill vara med på resan att bygga Software and Embedded Solutions verksamhet i Karlstad! Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt, bidra med din kompetens och utvecklas i en dynamisk miljö. Vill du vara med och forma framtiden tillsammans med oss? Då är detta din chans!”



Din roll



Som ingenjör på Etteplan kommer du att arbeta i mindre team med projektets alla delar, alltifrån tidig designspecifikation till utprovning i fält hos våra kunder. Alla projekt bedrivs i våra egna lokaler i Mjärdevi Science Park.


Våra kunder ligger i täten inom expansiva, globala industrisegment där kraven på kvalitet och tillförlitlighet är höga och kunder finns inom branscher som till exempel flyg, fordon, försvar och konsument. Vi erbjuder spetskompetens inom bland annat funktionssäkerhet, industriella kontrollsystem och avancerade mätsystem. Allt arbete sker i våra egna lokaler vilket ger extra energi och inspiration i arbetet, och den stora variationen gör att du snabbt utvecklar din kompetens och helhetsförståelse. Låter det intressant?


Du har med dig



Vi söker en lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta i en föränderlig omvärld och snarare se möjligheter och utmaningar än hinder och problem. Flexibilitet, prestigelöshet och möjligheter bör vara ord som du kan relatera till och trivs med. Du skall vara kommunikativ och ödmjuk samt professionellt kunna hantera våra kunder och kollegor. Vidare har du goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift. På grund av att många av våra kunder idag finns inom försvars- och energisektorn så ska medborgarskap vara något vi behöver beakta i denna rekryteringsomgång.


Det är viktigt att du:


* Är civil- eller högskoleingenjör i grunden
* Har minst 5 års yrkeserfarenhet av hårdvarunära mjukvaruutveckling i C/C++ och agilt arbete
* Har svenskt medborgarskap
* Är flyttande på svenska och engelska.



Det är meriterande om du har:


* Erfarenhet av C#, Python, .NET och Linux
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade byggen och automatiserad testning
* Erfarenhet att jobba med mjukvaruutveckling inom säkerhetskritiska system
* Vilja och förmåga att direkt eller på sikt leda delar av eller hela projekt

Att vara konsult hos Etteplan



Som senior konsult hos Etteplan får du arbeta med spännande och komplexa uppdrag där din erfarenhet verkligen gör skillnad. Du kombinerar tryggheten av en stabil arbetsgivare med möjligheten att bidra i projekt som både är tekniskt utmanande och spänner över branscher som påverkar människors vardag och framtid. Vi ser att din erfarenhet är en nyckel i att hitta smarta, hållbara och effektiva lösningar.



Vi erbjuder en miljö där du kan utvecklas vidare, oavsett om du vill fördjupa din specialistkompetens, leda projekt eller agera rådgivare. Hos oss möter du både juniora talanger och kollegor med lång erfarenhet, och tillsammans driver vi innovativa lösningar som gör nytta för både kund och samhälle.



Vi har trygga och konkurrenskraftiga villkor, med kollektivavtal, tjänstepension enligt ITP1 eller ITP2 (inklusive flexpension) samt försäkringar. Dessutom ingår friskvårdsbidrag och tillgång till företagshälsovård. Vill du veta mer om våra förmåner? Du hittar hela listan längre ner på sidan.



Ansökan och nästa steg



Ansökan sker genom att du laddar upp ditt CV och besvarar några korta frågor kopplade till tjänsten. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så avvakta inte med din ansökan. Rekryteringsprocessen inleds med en telefonintervju och följs av möten med ansvarig konsultchef samt vid behov ytterligare kollegor. Vårt mål är att processen ska vara smidig för att vi tillsammans ska kunna ta nästa kliv framåt.



Känner du att Etteplan är rätt för dig? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt team!

title: PRAKTIKPLATS - LIA - Backendutvecklare
description:
**PRAKTIKPLATS - LIA - Backendutveckling**

Vi söker 1-2 praktikanter som vill vara med och utveckla vårt affärssystem. Vi har påbörjat att utveckla systemet men vi behöver några hjärnor till som kan hjälpa oss att slutföra arbetuppgiften. Projektet byggs i **GitHub**, och när utvecklingen är klar kommer systemet att publiceras och hanteras via Supabase. Du arbetar med 1-2 till prakikanter samt VD och får bidra till att bygga och förbättra systemets funktioner för att effektivisera verksamheten.

**Utvecklingsmiljö**

* **Next.js**
* **React**
* **Node.js & npm/yarn**
* **Git & GitHub**

**Personliga egenskaper som vi söker:**  
\* Driven och självgående  
\* Noggrann och strukturerad  
\* Engagerad och nyfiken på att lära

**Vi erbjuder:**  
Du får möjlighet att utvecklas i skarpt läge och bygga värdefulla erfarenheter.  
Du arbetar i ett centralt beläget kontor nära Stureplan med bra kommunikationer.  
Möjlighet till distansarbete.  
Ersättning: Vi betalar ditt SL-kort.

**Våra verksamheter:**  
www.thebrandconcept.se  
www.pinsfactory.se

Arbetstid/Varaktighet: Enligt överenskommelse  
Jobbtyp: Heltid, på plats eller distans  
Arbetsort: Stockholm

**Start:** Omgående eller enligt ök.

***Bra att veta:*** *Vi är inte ett IT-företag, men tillsammans driver vi projketet i mål. Vid behov finns extern expert att hyra in om vi fastnar men just nu rullar det på utan hinder.* 

Jobbtyp: Heltid, Deltid

Lön: 1,00kr per år

Förmåner:

* Jobba hemifrån

Ansökningsfrågor:

* Längd på praktiken: ?
* Har du någon erfarenhet av beskrivna programiljöer?
* Vilen utbildning går du nu eller har avslutat: ?
* När kan du starta?

Arbetsort: Delvis på distans i Stockholm
company_description: The Brand Concept profilerar företag. Vi erbjuder profilreklam och tjänster som förstärker varumärken, marknadskommunikation och driver aktivt mot resultat.

title: Full-Stack .NET & Azure Developer
description:
Passionate about coding? Join us as a .NET Azure Developer and solve exciting challenges with a talented, supportive tech team!
At If IT, we work intensively to develop and adapt our solutions to meet our customers in the digital world. We build our solutions based on modern Microsoft Technology. The goal is to develop our IT-landscape according to a Nordic agenda and give our customers the best possible experience. We are now looking for a skilled full-stack .NET Azure Developer to join our Nordic development team. The position is based in Turku (Finland) or Stockholm (Sweden).
About the role
In this role, you will work with our most modern IT-systems. You will be an important member of a Nordic development team, building .NET Azure applications and services for our Nordic Customer Centers. You will enable our Frontliners to provide World Class Service to our Customers. We enjoy, for example, trunk-based development, Event Sourcing, automated tests as documentation, functional programming concepts and pipelines/infrastructure as code.
Some of the technologies we are using:* .NET/C#
* Typescript /JavaScript/React
* Azure: App Service, Functions, Service Bus, Cosmos DB, AI Search


This could be a great opportunity for you to learn new technology, so you don´t need to be an expert in all these areas today.
We offer
Here are some of the benefits of working at If:* An including work environment where everyone is welcome
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Lunch benefit
* Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities
* Great insurance benefits


About the team
The team is a distributed team of 13 people based in Turku and Stockholm. Most of them are experienced developers, and the whole team collaborates daily in a positive and constructive atmosphere.
Who are you?
You have five years of system development experience in relevant technologies. It´s important that you have a genuine interest in technology and are a skilled developer. We work in an agile environment, and you are familiar with these principles.
We prefer that you have an academic education in IT, but relevant experience and competence are also important. You are a curious and positive person. It´s easy for you to communicate with colleagues in English and preferably also in a local language (Finnish or Swedish).
Additional facts and the recruitment process
Application deadline: Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, application deadline is 19th of December 2025.
To apply for the position: Please attach your CV and answer the questions in the application form.
Work location: Turku (Finland) or Stockholm (Sweden).
Start: According to agreement.*Background checks for this position will be done in accordance with the law in the country of employment*.
We look forward to your application!

title: Fullstackutvecklare till Tellusgruppen!
description:
**Är du en fullstackutvecklare som vill vara med och forma framtidens EdTech? Har du en strategisk höjd i kombination med djup kompetens och operativ leveransförmåga? Trivs du med att arbeta i en dynamisk och utvecklande arbetsmiljö som präglas av självledarskap och samarbete?**

**Då vill vi välkomna dig att söka tjänsten som fullstackutvecklare hos oss på Tellusgruppen.**


Om rollenSom vår fullstackutvecklare får du en nyckelroll och blir den tekniska drivkraften bakom vidareutvecklingen av vår plattform Kentaur. Du får en central roll i ett mindre team bestående av 2–3 utvecklare och studentmedarbetare, där du stöttar deras utveckling och ser till att deras arbete integreras i helheten. Rollen är både strategisk och operativ – du skriver kod, leder tekniska beslut och säkerställer att våra lösningar är skalbara, användarvänliga och redo för framtidens behov.


Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm på Tellusgruppens huvudkontor med möjlighet till hybridarbete.

**Dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar bland annat:**

* Leda utvecklingen och anpassningen av vår kundportal.
* Arkitektur och tekniska beslut kring Kentaur.
* Applikationsutveckling med Next.js, React och Supabase.
* Utveckla logik för komplexa funktioner, till exempel schemaläggning, resursplanering och flödesstyrning.
* Integrera AI-lösningar i Kentaurportalen genom kod och bidra med AI-stöd i programmeringen.

 **Din bakgrund**  

För att lyckas i rollen önskar vi att du har arbetat som fullstackutvecklare med några års erfarenhet inom området. Du ska ha goda kunskaper i programmeringsspråk som JavaScript/TypeScript och vara förtrogen med ramverket React och olika databasteknologier. Vidare vill vi gärna att du har en god förståelse för API-design och systemintegrationer, samt erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnplattformar. Ett intresse för och erfarenhet av att arbeta med AI-lösningar är meriterande och kommer att värderas högt.

**Din personlighet**  

För att trivas i rollen ser vi gärna att du har god kommunikationsförmåga och viljan att skapa en inspirerande och lärande arbetsmiljö. Du uppfattas som en självgående, prestigelös och samarbetsorienterad kollega. Du är van att arbeta effektivt både självständigt och i team samt har god förmåga att hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt.

**Om Tellusgruppen**  

Tellusgruppen bildades 2012 och är verksam inom barnomsorg och utbildning. Koncernen driver bland annat förskolor, grundskolor, barnpassning samt utbildningstjänster och kompetensutveckling. Tellusgruppens affärsidé är att starta, driva och utveckla lönsamma och växande bolag inom sektorerna barnomsorg och utbildning. Läs mer om oss här: **TELLUSGRUPPEN**

**Har vi väckt ditt intresse?**  

Commitment Search är vår rekryteringspartner varför du är välkommen att enkelt söka tjänsten på www.commitmentsearch.se.Sök gärna tjänsten omgående då urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande. Tjänsten kommer att tillsättas så snart det blir rätt matchning mellan Tellutsgruppen och kandidat.


Har du frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen eller tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta vår VD, Manne Didehvar på +46 (0)70-962 75 10.

title: Solution Developer- Fullstack
description:
**Company Description**
 We are a consulting company with a bunch of tech-savvy and happy people!
   

  

 We love technology, we love design, and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where every individual is highly valued.
   

  

 With us, everyone can be themselves while respecting others for who they are. We believe that when an amazing mix of people come together and share their knowledge, experiences, and ideas, we can help our clients on a completely different level.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who can start immediately and wants to grow with us!
   

  

 With us, you have great opportunities to make real progress in your career and the chance to take on significant responsibility.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a
 **Full-Stack Solution Developer** 
 to join our dynamic team. You will be part of an agile team responsible for building and maintaining a modern platform based on a micro-frontend architecture. The team includes a tech lead, back-end and front-end developers, QA engineers, a product owner, and customer experience specialists. You will work closely with stakeholders to deliver high-quality solutions that continuously improve our services.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and maintain full-stack applications within a micro-frontend architecture.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software and solutions.
* Apply agile practices, including continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD).
* Implement DevOps practices to improve deployment, monitoring, and automation processes.
* Participate in code reviews, testing, and troubleshooting to ensure system reliability.
* Contribute to technical documentation and knowledge sharing across teams.


 Qualifications
   

  

* Proven experience working with DevOps practices and tools (CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, monitoring, deployment).
* Strong proficiency in both frontend and backend technologies (e.g., JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, Java, .NET, or similar).
* Experience with microservices or micro-frontend architectures.
* Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.


**Qualifications:**
* 4–8 years of professional experience in full-stack development.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work effectively in an agile team.


 Additional Information
   

  

**Start date:** 
 ASAP
   

  

**Mode of Work:** 
 Hybrid
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months probationary employment.
   

  

 We interview candidates on an ongoing basis, do not wait to submit your application.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
En av våra kunder, ett medelstort företag inom offentlig sektor, söker en frontendutvecklare med gedigen erfarenhet av React, TypeScript och moderna CSS-metoder för att bygga tillgängliga och skalbara applikationer som gör verklig skillnad. Meriterande är erfarenhet av Turborepo, React Router 7, Azure Container Apps eller TailwindCSS.
 



  





 Teamet är mitt uppe i en spännande transformationsfas där IT-systemen moderniseras och webbapplikationerna byggs om från grunden, vilket ger en unik möjlighet att påverka både utvecklingen och verksamheten.
 



  





**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Designa, utveckla och underhålla högkvalitativa frontendapplikationer för både externa och interna användare
* Implementera responsiva och tillgängliga gränssnitt med React, TypeScript och CSS
* Samarbeta med backend- och infrastrukturlag (C#) för att säkerställa sömlösa integrationer
* Bidra till applikationernas prestanda, skalbarhet och säkerhet



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av React och TypeScript
* Stark kompetens inom CSS (moderna ramverk, responsiv design, tillgänglighetsstandarder)
* Erfarenhet av Git
* God förståelse för frontendutvecklings bästa praxis
* Meriterande: erfarenhet av Turborepo, React Router 7, Azure Container Apps eller TailwindCSS



  





**Vad kan de erbjuda dig?** 



* En chans att påverka samhällsutvecklingen och bidra till hållbarhet genom arbete inom offentlig sektor
* Tillgång till internationella nätverk med möjlighet till globalt samarbete och deltagande i konferenser
* Möjlighet att vara med från start i stora digitaliseringsprojekt som ger både tekniska utmaningar och karriärutveckling
* En inkluderande och stödjande arbetskultur där teamarbete och meningsfullhet står i centrum



  





 Skicka in din ansökan redan idag och ta chansen att bli en nyckelspelare i ett projekt som gör skillnad – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Developer Team Lead (Frontend)
description:
**ComeOn Group in short**
 Founded in 2008, ComeOn Group is a leading global player in the rapidly growing iGaming market. Having launched its first online brand in 2010, ComeOn Group is running a wide range of exciting brands across multiple markets. Operating more than 20 brands on its proprietary platform providing a secure, innovative and entertainment-led player experience across casino and sports betting. ComeOn Group is an international employer within the iGaming industry and has over 500 talented employees across 7 main locations.
   

  

**The Role**
 We are seeking a passionate and experienced Developer Team Lead (Frontend) to join our innovative team at ComeOn Group. In this pivotal role, you will lead the frontend development team, driving the technical vision and delivering high-quality web applications that enhance the iGaming experience for our customers. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that user experience is optimized while adhering to best practices in code quality, architecture, and performance.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Lead, mentor and grow a team of frontend developers while fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence
* Design and architect robust, scalable, and high-performance web applications
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend teams to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic
* Oversee code reviews and enforce coding standards to maintain high-quality code
* Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend technologies and industry trends to continuously improve the team's skills and output
* Support the team in problem-solving and troubleshooting technical challenges


**Requirements**
**About you:**
* Strong experience in frontend development with proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with modern frameworks such as React or Angular
* Proven experience in a leadership role, mentoring and guiding a team of developers
* Excellent understanding of web performance optimization techniques and best practices
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and project management tools
* Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, Agile environment
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills; ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
* Fluency in written and spoken English


**Benefits**
**So what can you expect from ComeOn as a place of work?**
 ComeOn offers a competitive and consistent benefits package for our team members. While some benefits vary by location due to local needs and regulations, many are available company-wide, and we're proud to offer them to everyone:
   

  

* Fantastic quarterly or half-yearly team events
* Regular company events
* A 250 euro One-time Hybrid Allowance to help you set up your home office (or equivalent in local currency)
* Annual wellbeing allowance/ gym membership (location dependent)
* 40 days ‘Work from Another Location' (WFAL) entitlement to work from any other location around the world
* 30 days paid vacation


 At ComeOn, we've embraced a Hybrid Work model, giving our employees the flexibility to work some days at home. Our offices are thoughtfully designed to support this model, featuring practical workspaces for focused efforts and collaborative zones for dynamic creative exchanges. We believe in the power of collaboration to drive innovation and success. While our offices are known for their vibrant atmosphere, rest assured that our primary focus is on achieving results together. We prioritize efficiency and maintain a balance between hard work and camaraderie. When you visit our offices, expect a warm welcome and professional support. Choose ComeOn for your next career move, and experience a workplace that values productivity, teamwork, and the spirit of collaboration.
   

  

 At ComeOn Group, we value diversity and we take concrete action to ensure fairness in our recruitment process. We are committed to assessing candidates on their merit without discriminating against any applicant for whatever reason that is protected by law. We truly value you, as you are.
   

  

 Want to know more about us? Just visit any of our social media channels to take a deep dive into our culture!
   

  

 LinkedIn
   

  

 Instagram
   

  

 Glassdoor

title: C++ Developer
description:
**Company Description**
 Technology is our how. And people are our why. For over two decades, we have been harnessing technology to drive meaningful change.
   

  

 By combining world-class engineering, industry expertise and a people-centric mindset, we consult and partner with leading brands from various industries to create dynamic platforms and intelligent digital experiences that drive innovation and transform businesses.
   

  

 From prototype to real-world impact - be part of a global shift by doing work that matters.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented C++ Developer to join our dynamic team in Stockholm, Sweden. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-performance C++ applications while implementing DevOps practices to streamline our development and deployment processes.
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain C++ telecom solutions with a focus on performance and scalability
* Containerize applications using Docker and orchestrate them with Kubernetes
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve software development lifecycle
* Optimize and troubleshoot application performance issues
* Implement and maintain monitoring and logging solutions for applications and infrastructure
* Contribute to the design and implementation of microservices architecture
* Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration management
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in C++ development and DevOps
* Three days work from office or client location.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
* 2-3 years experience in C++ development, with a strong understanding of modern C++ standards and telecom.
* Proficiency in version control systems, particularly Git
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI
* Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix systems and shell scripting
* Familiarity with scripting languages like Python or Bash
* Experience with containerization technologies, especially Docker and Kubernetes
* Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and their services
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus and ELK stack
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
* Experience with microservices architecture and distributed systems
* Knowledge of performance optimization techniques and troubleshooting methodologies
* Can speak and write fluently in English


 Additional Information
   

  

 Discover some of the global benefits that empower our people to become the best version of themselves:
   

  

  

* Finance:
   

 Competitive salary package, value-based recognition awards, referral bonus;
* Career Development:
   

 Career coaching, global career opportunities, non-linear career paths, internal development programmes for management and technical leadership;
* Learning Opportunities:
   

 Complex projects, rotations, internal tech communities, training, certifications, coaching, online learning platforms subscriptions, pass-it-on sessions, workshops, conferences;
* Work-Life Balance:
   

 Hybrid work and flexible working hours, employee assistance programme;
* Health:
   

 Global internal wellbeing programme, access to wellbeing apps;
* Community:
   

 Global internal tech communities, hobby clubs and interest groups, inclusion and diversity programmes, events and celebrations.


 At Endava, we’re committed to creating an open, inclusive, and respectful environment where everyone feels safe, valued, and empowered to be their best. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives—because we know that inclusive teams help us deliver smarter, more innovative solutions for our customers. Hiring decisions are based on merit, skills, qualifications, and potential. If you need adjustments or support during the recruitment process, please let us know.

title: Fullstack Developer (Node.js, React, AWS)
description:
Dedicated to powering entrepreneurs, Qred is a profitable, fast-growing fintech scale-up bank. In just 10 years, we’ve grown from a startup to hitting 1 billion SEK in annual revenue supporting over 50,000 entrepreneurs and helping create 10,000+ jobs every year. We combine smart tech with real-world experience to make funding simple, fast, and fair for entrepreneurs who need it most. With strong backing, a flat organization, and bold growth plans, we’re now looking for a Fullstack Developer to join us and shape the future of small business owners.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Int this role, you'll be a part of our
 **Underwriting team** 
 , which sits within the
 **Operations Domain** 
 . This team focuses on a clear problem space within Qred's business, primarily managing the complex core function of credit decisioning. They are vital in our mission to automate and streamline the decision-making process for entrepreneurs seeking funding.
   

  

* Own the Core Decision Process: You will be instrumental in developing and optimizing Qred's proprietary credit assessment and decision systems. This work is at the heart of our operations and directly informs whether a loan is approved.
* Backend Development: This role leans into backend Node.js development and complex system integrations. You’ll be focused on improving efficiency and accuracy in data processing, leveraging our internal systems and integrating new data sources.
* End-to-End Responsibility: From initial idea to running the product in production, you and your team own the whole process. You'll design the infrastructure-as-code (IaC), write the tests, deploy the service, and ensure high-quality observability.


**This Is What We're Looking Role**
 We are seeking a developer ready to take full ownership and contribute to our core operations.
   

  

* Experience in writing, releasing, and maintaining web applications, preferably with Node.js, React, and AWS.
* You embrace end-to-end ownership and take responsibility for your contributions. You are pragmatic, hands-on, and always seek to keep it simple.
* You're energized by a fast-moving workplace and approach work with a positive, flexible attitude and strong team spirit.
* You naturally challenge the way things are done. You view setbacks as opportunities to learn and improve, and you value sharing best practices with your team.


**What Will Make You Stand Out**
* Experience with the fintech industry.


**Why join us?**
 This is the place to be if you’re looking for a place to grow. Qred is growing fast, and our Qredsters along with it. With a non-bureaucratic organization and delegated responsibilities, we make sure there’s a short path from idea to action. In addition to our great culture, you get to work with the latest cutting-edge techniques offered by AWS, responsibility for the whole development chain, and last but not least a bunch of new competent colleagues to learn from!
   

  

**One last thing**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application, we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
   

  

*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*
 Qred is an international FinTech scale-up that specializes in digital financing solutions for small businesses, with operations in the Nordics, Benelux, Germany and Brazil. We are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and grow, by providing them with business loans and credit cards. Right now we’re in an exciting phase of our journey that focuses on growth through smart product development and technology fueled by international expansion.

title: Mobile Developer (Kotlin)
description:
**Job Description**

**WHAT YOU’LL DO​**




 As a Mobile Developer, you'll ensure seamless and engaging experiences across smartphones, PCs, and other devices. Experience with multiple device types, payments, and iOS is highly valued. While Kotlin is the main language, JavaScript and TypeScript are also useful. Your work will cover POS sales, payments, back-office applications, mobile payments, self-checkout stations, and standout in-store payment solutions.
   

  





**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH**




 At Store Lens, we work closely with Portfolio Brands and H&M Brand to design and provide technical solutions. We contribute to product development at every stage, from setting requirements to rollout and testing. From day one, we focus on improving by listening, building, and refining as we go. Even as we define requirements, we are already thinking ahead, using early designs, first developments, and new learnings to continuously make the product better.
   

  





 We are curious, active listeners and hands-on doers.
   

  





 Beyond your work with Store Lens, you will also be part of our Engineering community, where you will have access to a network of experts, resources, and opportunities to grow.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE​**




 We are looking for people with…​
   

  




* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience), and at least 5-8 years of experience as a Software Engineer with mobile and front end focus.
* Proficiency in Android development in Kotlin.
* Proficiency in build secure applications with Microsoft Login and Single Sign-On capabilities.
* Experience in mobile development for multiple devices.
* Experience Integrate hardware and communicate effectively with Android applications.
* Experience to work with SDKs from external vendors.
* Experience in Consume web services (e.g., REST APIs).
* Collaborate with UX/UI designers and utilize Figma for design implementation.
* Experience of CI/ CD pipelines using Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions.
* Knowledge and apply basic Mobile Device Management (MDM) principles (e.g., Airwatch).
* Experience in POS, Payment and Checkout area is a plus.
* IOS development, experience is a plus.
* Apply basic web development skills is a plus.



*And people who have* 
 :
   

  




* Continuous learning mindset to stay updated on emerging trends and technologies in backend testing.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment and communicate technical concepts clearly.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Experience conducting code reviews, identifying areas of improvement, and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality and consistency.
* Familiarity in backend testing with a focus on ensuring the reliability and performance of backend systems.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


**Additional Information**

**WHO WE ARE** 
 ​
   

  





 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.​
   

  





 ​We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. ​
   

  





**​WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
 ​
   

  





 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  





 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  





**JOIN US​** 
  

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.​
   

  





 ​Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.​
   

  





 ​
 *\*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.​*

title: Software Developer
description:
**🔐 Utveckla framtiden med oss!** 




 Omegapoint är ett ledande cybersäkerhetsföretag som arbetar med säker digitalisering. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta med branchens mest erfarna experter och utveckla samhällskritiska lösningar. Vi utvecklar och förvaltar säkra system tillsammans med våra kunder och nu söker vi fler vassa utvecklare till vårt område Code i Stockholm.
 



  





  





**Om rollen** 




 I denna roll blir du en viktig spelare i vårt team och vi tror därför att du är en lagspelare med högt ansvarstagande och kvalitetstänk. Du trivs i kundnära relationer där du är en både strukturerad och engagerad rådgivare och har förmåga att omsätta dina kunskaper i konkreta lösningar. Du är van att agera självständigt och är inte rädd för att ta egna initiativ.
 



 För att trivas tror vi att du är utåtriktad, driven och kvalitetsmedveten. Vi ser gärna att du har en stark vilja att utvecklas och håller dig uppdaterad om de senaste teknikerna och idéerna inom domänen. Vi ser även att du är en stolt utvecklare som alltid strävar efter att skapa värde. Vidare är du prestigelös och delar gärna med dig av din erfarenhet och kompetens både internt och externt.
 



  





  





**Vi tror att du:** 



* Har minst fyra års erfarenhet som utvecklare och en utbildning inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande.
* Har erfarenhet av programmering i Java, C#/.NET eller liknande.
* Arbetar kvalitetsinriktat och känner dig bekväm med såväl testdriven utveckling som automatiserade tester.
* Har kunskap kring IaC, pipelines och traditionell DevOps/DevSecOps.
* Behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Är intresserad av säkerhet även om ingen tidigare erfarenhet inom det krävs.



  





  





**Om Omegapoint** 




 Omegapoint grundades 2001 och är Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Med en vision om en framtid där vi fullt ut kan lita på teknik använder vi vår expertis för att säkra våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling. Vi är vassa och snälla, något som karaktäriseras av vår kompetensutvecklingskultur och viljan att dela vår kunskap med varandra. För närvarande är vi över 900 anställda konsulter i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala, Umeå och Montreal.
 



  





  





**🌱 Vi satsar på dig** 




 På Omegapoint sätter vi din kompetens i centrum och ger dig alla förutsättningar för ett utvecklande och varierat jobb:
 


* **Utveckling och aktiviteter** 
 : vi ordnar regelbundet aktiviteter på vårt kontor på Vasagatan i Stockholm för att vi ska utvecklas och ha roligt tillsammans. Vi har bland annat en egen idrottsförening och festkommitté.
* **Kompetenskultur** 
 : vi samarbetar, delar kunskap och stärker varandra. Årliga kompetenskonferenser är ett självklart inslag. En gång i månaden har vi även Kompetensdag på kontoret.
* **Spännande uppdrag** 
 : vår kundbas sträcker sig från små specialistföretag till stora välkända företag och myndigheter, vilket ger både utmanande och roliga projekt.
* **Förmåner och trygghet** 
 : vi erbjuder marknadsmässiga löner, förstärkt föräldralön, anpassade förmånspaket, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring och möjlighet till delägarskap.



  





 Men viktigast av allt – vi har en kultur där vi utvecklas tillsammans, delar kunskap och har riktigt roligt längs vägen.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
Intric is accelerating its growth, driven by a fresh round of funding from investors and strong demand from both existing and new customers.
   

  

 Our platform - Intric.ai - is currently transforming how work is done, primarily within the public sector and companies that value data sovereignty, by making the power of AI accessible to a wider audience. We have secured a market-leading position in a niche of this segment.
   

  

 We are seeking a motivated individual eager to embark on the journey of a lifetime with our expanding and driven team.
   

  

**Your role**
 As a Backend Engineer, you will be working on the product, from building new features to improving the infrastructure.
   

  

****Key Responsibilities****
 You will be instrumental in ensuring that we build the best possible product in the shortest amount of time, without compromising on scalability or robustness. This includes:
   

  

* Building new features.
* Improving the developer experience.
* Improving the infrastructure.


**Ideal Candidate Profile**
**Core qualities**
* Intelligent and execution-focused, with a knack for delivering results.
* Independent thinker who can identify optimal solutions for integration challenges.
* Driven by challenges and adept at overcoming technical hurdles.


**Cultural attributes**
* Committed to our long-term vision and willing to grow with the organization.
* Passionate about building extraordinary solutions from the ground up.
* Collaborative team player who excels in competitive environments.


**Qualifications**
* BSc or MSc in Computer Science or related field.
* 2+ years of professional experience.
* Demonstrated interest and enthusiasm for artificial intelligence technologies.
* Evidence of completed projects demonstrating technical expertise.
* Examples of overcoming specific technical challenges with tangible solutions.
* A track record that showcases initiative and contributions beyond typical job requirements.


**What We Offer**
* Be a part of a visionary and driven team establishing the future of AI in Europe.
* Work in a stimulating environment with opportunities for professional growth.
* Rapid career development in an exciting, fast-moving sector.
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options.


**Our tech-stack**
**Backend App**
 Python, FastAPI
   

  

**Infrastructure**
 Docker, PostgreSQL, Redis, pgvector, Arq, vLLM, Kubernetes
   

  

**Other Important Tools / Techniques**
 Linux, Bash, Domain Driven Design

title: Full-Stack .NET & Azure Developer
description:
Passionate about coding? Join us as a .NET Azure Developer and solve exciting challenges with a talented, supportive tech team!
   

  

 At If IT, we work intensively to develop and adapt our solutions to meet our customers in the digital world. We build our solutions based on modern Microsoft Technology. The goal is to develop our IT-landscape according to a Nordic agenda and give our customers the best possible experience. We are now looking for a skilled full-stack .NET Azure Developer to join our Nordic development team. The position is based in Turku (Finland) or Stockholm (Sweden).
   

  

**About The Role**
 In this role, you will work with our most modern IT-systems. You will be an important member of a Nordic development team, building .NET Azure applications and services for our Nordic Customer Centers. You will enable our Frontliners to provide World Class Service to our Customers. We enjoy, for example, trunk-based development, Event Sourcing, automated tests as documentation, functional programming concepts and pipelines/infrastructure as code.
   

  

 Some of the technologies we are using:
   

  

* .NET/C#
* Typescript /JavaScript/React
* Azure: App Service, Functions, Service Bus, Cosmos DB, AI Search


 This could be a great opportunity for you to learn new technology, so you don´t need to be an expert in all these areas today.
   

  

**We offer**
 Here are some of the benefits of working at If:
   

  

* An including work environment where everyone is welcome
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Lunch benefit
* Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities
* Great insurance benefits


**About The Team**
 The team is a distributed team of 13 people based in Turku and Stockholm. Most of them are experienced developers, and the whole team collaborates daily in a positive and constructive atmosphere.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You have five years of system development experience in relevant technologies. It´s important that you have a genuine interest in technology and are a skilled developer. We work in an agile environment, and you are familiar with these principles.
   

  

 We prefer that you have an academic education in IT, but relevant experience and competence are also important. You are a curious and positive person. It´s easy for you to communicate with colleagues in English and preferably also in a local language (Finnish or Swedish).
   

  

**Additional Facts And The Recruitment Process**
**Application deadline:** 
 Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, application deadline is 19th of December 2025.
   

**To apply for the position:** 
 Please attach your CV and answer the questions in the application form.
   

**Work location:** 
 Turku (Finland) or Stockholm (Sweden).
   

  

**Start:** 
 According to agreement.
   

  

*Background checks for this position will be done in accordance with the law in the country of employment* 
 .
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
**About Anyfin**
 At Anyfin, we believe in simplicity, transparency, and fairness. We’re the fintech on a mission to challenge the status quo, lowering interest rates, removing unnecessary fees, and helping people take control of their finances.
   

  

 With more than a million app downloads and presence in Sweden, Norway, Finland, and Germany, we’ve already helped hundreds of thousands of people save money and feel more financially empowered.
   

  

 We recently obtained our banking license, opening up an entirely new world of opportunities to provide more value to our customers, build even smarter products, scale our technology, and expand into new markets. This next chapter comes with exciting technical challenges — and we’re looking for someone who’s eager to take them on.
   

  

 The role
   

  

 As a Senior Fullstack Developer At Anyfin, You’ll Play a Key Part In Shaping The Future Of Our Products, From Concept To Launch. You’ll
   

  

* Work across the stack, mainly using Typescript, Node.js, React, and React Native.
* Take end-to-end ownership of features and projects: backend architecture, APIs, data models, frontend, mobile apps, deployment, and operations.
* Help drive improvements across our codebase, processes, and product, bringing that startup mindset where you take initiative, move fast, and get things done.
* Balance speed with quality, because we care about building things that last and seeing our work make a real difference for our users.
* Contribute to our mission to make finances fairer and empower people to make better financial decisions.


 What we’re looking for
   

  

* At least 5 years of professional experience in TypeScript development, across both frontend and backend.
* Hands-on experience with Node.js, React, React Native, or similar frameworks and an ability to handle complexity, scalability, and user-centered design.
* Solid understanding of databases, API design, testing, CI/CD, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or similar).
* A problem-solver who takes ownership, speaks up, and helps the team and product move forward.
* Comfortable in a fast-paced, ever-evolving environment where change is part of the fun.


 We offer
   

  

 A meaningful role where your work directly impacts how people experience and manage their finances.
   

  

 The chance to work alongside talented engineers, product managers, and designers with real influence on the product direction.
   

  

 A culture built on authenticity, ownership, transparency, and having fun while doing impactful work.
   

  

 Why Anyfin?
   

  

 At Anyfin, you’ll find a team driven by purpose, curiosity, and a shared ambition to make a difference. We promise a challenging and rewarding journey that will sharpen your skills, expand your creativity, and allow you to work on meaningful projects. Plus, enjoy the benefits of a centrally-located Stockholm office, competitive compensation, extra time off on your birthday, and many other perks we’ll share when we meet!
   

  

 Are you ready to help us revolutionize financial well-being for all?
   

  

 Apply today, and let’s build something amazing together. We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.
   

  

*Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.*
 Anyfin is a fintech on a mission to simplify loan repayments and improve the financial well-being of millions. We help consumers reduce the costs of high-interest loans, and take control of their repayment plan.

title: Account Manager / Business Developer
description:
**Position Summary:** 




  





 The Account Manager is responsible for developing new business relationships and serving as the first level of support to existing B2B clients.
 



  





**Position responsibilities:** 




  




* Develop an effective understanding of the capability, benefits and competitive advantages of TransPerfect’s services
* Identify prospective customers and individual organizations to focus on sales activities
* Develop new client relationships via cold calling, Internet, and trade shows
* In coordination with Sales Management, identify, qualify, develop and close sales opportunities
* Promote and educate clients regarding TransPerfect’s services
* Provide customer support and manage client expectations in liaison with the Production Management Team
* Manage and control pricing and contractual issues by developing a thorough understanding of company procedures
* Take an active role in learning about each client’s industry, business needs and company culture to identify new business opportunities and provide a high level of service
* Perform other special projects or duties when required



  





  





**Required skills, experience and qualifications:** 




  




* Interest in or previous experience in Strategic Business Development and/or Client Services/Account Management
* Ability to build and maintain relationships
* Superior written and spoken communication skills in English and Swedish

 **5 days per week.**
* Most importantly, the ideal candidate must demonstrate ability to: multitask in a fast-paced environment, work well with people from a variety of different backgrounds and cultures, build strategic relationships with clients and co-workers, work as part of a team, take active measures to solve problems and commit to a high level of service



  





**Desired skills and experience:** 




  




* Previous Account Management experience is beneficial



  





 By applying, I confirm I have read and accept TransPerfect's Privacy Policy: https://www.transperfect.com/about/data-privacy-recruiting

title: Master Thesis: Green code with LLM
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Are you prepared to tackle the challenge of assessing and improving the sustainability of AI-generated code? This master’s thesis centers on GenAI-assisted coding—where Large Language Models (LLMs) support tasks like code completion, generation, refactoring, and optimization—and examines ways to make the produced software more energy-efficient and environmentally friendly.
   

  

 With GenAI tools increasingly adopted across software development, it’s vital to understand and reduce the environmental impact of generated code for responsible innovation. You will assess the environmental performance of current LLM-driven development tools, identify key stages in the software lifecycle that affect the energy consumption of generated code, and propose or implement optimizations to produce cleaner, greener, and more sustainable outputs.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Analyse and benchmark GenAI coding tools to evaluate energy efficiency and environmental impact
* Investigate code-generation factors (for example, algorithms, memory management, and language features) that influence runtime and energy usage
* Design and assess strategies to make LLM-assisted code generation more sustainable
* Explore how to incorporate green coding practices into GenAI tools and developer workflows
* Run experiments on cloud environments and container orchestration platforms to measure effects on performance and efficiency


**The skills you bring:**
* Strong foundation in machine learning; experience with LLMs or GenAI is advantageous
* Solid software development knowledge and proficiency in languages such as Python and Golang
* Familiarity with cloud technologies, including Docker and Kubernetes
* Analytical ability for performance measurement and optimisation
* A strong interest in sustainable software engineering and green AI practices


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 773643

title: Software Engineer - Data Infrastructure - OpenSearch/ElasticSearch
description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to provide multi-cloud and on-premise data solutions for the enterprise. The data platform team is a collaborative team that develops a full range of data stores and data technologies, spanning from big data, through NoSQL, cache-layer capabilities, and analytics; all the way to structured SQL engines.
   

  

 The OpenSearch team is, among other things, focused on creating the best enterprise automation solution for search and analytics suites like OpenSearch and Elasticsearch.
   

  

 We have a number of openings we are looking to hire across a range of levels. We will help you identify a suitable position depending on your experience and interests. Engineers who thrive at Canonical are mindful of open-source community dynamics and equally aware of the needs of large, innovative organisations.
   

  

 Location: This role can be filled in European, Middle East and African time zones.
   

  

 What your day will look like
   

  

 The OpenSearch team is responsible for the automation of OpenSearch operations. This includes ensuring fault-tolerant replication, TLS, installation, and much more; but also provides domain-specific expertise on the actual data system to other teams within Canonical. This role is focused on the creation and automation of features of data platforms, not analysing the data in them.
   

  

* Collaborate proactively with an internationally distributed team
* Write high-quality, idiomatic Python code to create new features
* Debug issues and interact with upstream communities publicly
* Work with helpful and talented engineers including experts in a diverse set of fields
* Work from home with global travel for 2 to 4 weeks per year for internal and external events


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Proven hands-on experience in software development using Python
* Proven hands-on experience in distributed systems development
* Bachelor's or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM, or a similar degree
* Willingness to travel up to 4 times a year for internal events


**Additional Skills That You Might Also Bring**
 You might also bring a subset of experience from the following, which will determine the exact role and level we consider you for:
   

  

* Experience operating and managing search and analytics engines like Elasticsearch, Logstash, KIbana, and OpenSearch
* Experience with Linux systems administration, package management, and operations
* Experience with the public cloud or a private cloud solution like OpenStack
* Experience with operating Kubernetes clusters and a belief that it can be used for serious persistent data services


 What we offer you
   

  

 Your base pay will depend on various factors including your geographical location, level of experience, knowledge and skills. In addition to the benefits above, certain roles are also eligible for additional benefits and rewards including annual bonuses and sales incentives based on revenue or utilisation. Our compensation philosophy is to ensure equity right across our global workforce.
   

  

 In addition to a competitive base pay, we provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. Please note that additional benefits may apply depending on the work location and, for more information on these, please ask your Talent Partner.
   

  

* Fully remote working environment - we've been working remotely since 2004!
* Personal learning and development budget of 2,000USD per annum
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Parental Leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues at 'sprints'
* Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.
   

  

 Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal-opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Senior Adobe Campaign-utvecklare
description:
*Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens DevOps-miljö hos ett bolag där teknik möter passion för djur? Vi söker dig som är en erfaren DevOps Engineer med djup kunskap inom Azure och ett brinnande intresse för att optimera utvecklings- och driftsprocesser.*
**Om jobbet**
 Som DevOps Engineer på Agria får du en nyckelroll i att stärka vår tekniska leverans genom att designa och vidareutveckla våra CI/CD-pipelines samt säkerställa robust och säker molninfrastruktur. Vi söker dig som både vill vara hands-on i tekniken och bidra strategiskt till våra DevOps-processer. Du är strukturerad, lösningsorienterad och trivs i en föränderlig organisation där du får stort utrymme att påverka.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:**
* Designa, implementera och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines
* Säkerställa implementering av DevSecOps-principer
* Automatisera driftsättningar och hantera infrastruktur i Azure Cloud
* Övervaka och optimera prestanda och säkerhet för våra molnbaserade lösningar
* Samarbeta nära utvecklingsteamen för att förbättra DevOps-flöden
* Felsöka tekniska problem kopplat till molninfrastruktur


**Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:**
* Djup kunskap om Azure Cloud-tjänster och verktyg
* Gedigen erfarenhet av DevSecOps
* Erfarenhet av Terraform, Ansible eller liknande verktyg för infrastruktur som kod
* Starkt grepp om CI/CD-principer, gärna via Azure DevOps, Jenkins eller GitLab CI
* Erfarenhet av Docker och Kubernetes
* Goda kunskaper i skriptning/programmering, t.ex. Python, Bash eller PowerShell
* Vana att jobba i agila och dynamiska teammiljöer
* Goda kunskaper i svenska, både muntligt och skriftligt


**Meriterande är även om du har:**
* En certifiering inom Azure (t.ex. Azure DevOps Engineer Expert)
* Erfarenhet av andra molnplattformar som AWS eller Google Cloud
* Kunskap om säkerhetsverktyg och best practices för molnmiljöer
* Erfarnhet av att arbeta som Scrum Master


 Som person är du en strukturerad och lösningsorienterad person som trivs i förändring och gillar att samarbeta. Med din nyfikenhet, ditt driv och din prestigelöshet bidrar du till både teknisk utveckling och ett gott teamklimat.
   

  

**Kontaktuppgifter** 
 :
   

  

 Rekryterande chef: Poja Daroui, poja.daroui@agria.se
   

  

 Facklig representant Forena: Emelié Mueller, emelie.mueller@agria.se
   

  

 Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen: Ellinor Jatéus, ellinor.jateus@lansforsakringar.se
   

  

*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*

title: Business Analyst
description:
**Role Overview** 




 The Specialist will work as a Business Analyst within complex IT and data-driven projects, primarily focused on ERP, retail, and logistics environments. The role requires strong analytical and documentation skills, experience in requirements management, and the ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders. A background in development and experience as a Scrum Master are strong advantages.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




**Business & System Analysis** 



* Analyze and document business needs, business processes, and functional requirements.
* Lead structured documentation of business processes and workflows.
* Translate business requirements into system specifications for development teams.
* Work closely with technical teams to understand system solutions, data architecture, and integrations.



**ERP, Retail & Logistics Focus** 



* Contribute to projects involving ERP implementations and retail/logistics processes.
* Support delivery planning, logistics operations, and solution integration needs.
