title: Grafisk designer på deltid till GiGi Agency!
description:
Sodajo söker för GiGi Agencys räkning en kreativ och nytänkande grafisk designer som vill växa tillsammans med ett bolag som vågar tänka annorlunda. Här blir du en del av en dynamisk byrå mitt på Avenyn, där uttryck, koncept och identitet får ta plats. Tjänsten är på deltid och passar särskilt dig som studerar eller har en annan huvudsaklig sysselsättning om minst 50%.
  
Information om tjänsten
  
Som grafisk designer på GiGi Agency arbetar du brett med både digital och tryckt kommunikation. Du blir involverad i kreativa processer, konceptframtagning och innehållsproduktion för flera branscher, framför allt inom underhållning och nöjesliv, men även corporatebolag som vill sticka ut.
  
Tjänsten är på deltid och du kommer att arbeta som konsult via Sodajo Consulting. Omfattningen är ca 20 timmar per vecka, med möjlighet till fler timmar vid behov. Arbetstiderna styr du till stor del själv, men vi ser gärna att du är på plats samtidigt som övriga kollegor, måndag – fredag 08:00-17:00. Du utgår från kontoret på Avenyn men har flexibilitet att arbeta hemifrån om studier eller livspusslet kräver detta.
  
I huvudsak söker vi en person i Göteborg, men för rätt person som kan vara självgående från start, fungerar arbete från annan ort!
  
  

**Du erbjuds:**  

GiGi Agency är ett dotterbolag i en större koncern, där du arbetar nära både interna och externa kunder. Här får du:
  
* Kreativt utrymme och fria händer i tonalitet och uttryck
* En arbetsplats som uppmuntrar att ligga steget före
* En vardag i högt tempo där underhållning och idéer står i centrum
* Möjlighet att vidareutveckla din tekniska och kreativa kompetens
* En miljö där man testar, utforskar och sticker ut visuellt


Arbetsuppgifter
  
I rollen kommer du att arbeta med att skapa kreativt material, allt från marknadsföring och innehåll för sociala medier till tryckmaterial såsom menyer, affischer och skyltar, samt producera rörligt material och presentationer för portfolio och försäljning. Du kommer även att producera nyhetsbrev, delta i kreativa processer för framtagning av koncept och visuella identiteter samt bidra till att vidareutveckla befintliga grafiska uttryck. Rollen innebär dessutom att stötta teamet med löpande designrelaterade uppgifter och säkerställa att allt material håller hög grafisk kvalitet.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

* Har en avslutad eller pågående utbildning inom grafisk design eller annat relevant område
* Har en dokumenterad portfolio med tidigare case
* Har starka kunskaper i Adobes Creative Cloud-program, som Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects och InDesign
* Har en annan huvudsaklig sysselsättning om minst 50%, exempelvis studier eller arbete
* Har goda kunskaper i det svenska och engelska språket, i tal och skrift


Meriterande är erfarenhet inom AI-verktyg för att ta dina idéer till nästa nivå. Erfarenhet av WordPress, GSAP eller Webflow, likväl kunskaper inom foto/film, annonsering och SEO, ser vi också som ett plus!
  
Personliga egenskaper
  
Dina personliga egenskaper är avgörande för hur väl du kommer att trivas i rollen. Vi ser att du är en kreativ, modig och nyfiken person som gärna utforskar nya uttryck och inte tvekar att utmana etablerade designstandarder redan i ett tidigt skede. Du trivs i ett högt tempo och tar dig snabbt an nya uppgifter, samtidigt som du är självgående och tar ansvar för kvalitén i din produktion. Du vill utvecklas tillsammans med både tekniken och teamet samt bidra till att skapa inspirerande och högkvalitativt material.
  
**Startdatum:** Omgående
  
**Tjänstens omfattning:** ca 20 h/veckan
  
**Placering:** Göteborg
  
**Urval:** Urval sker löpande
  
  

Kontakt
  
Är du den vi söker?
  
Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan
  
  

**Vid frågor kring tjänsten, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare:**  

Fanny Gustafsson
  
fanny.gustafsson@sodajo.se
  
072- 229 27 86

title: Bemanningskoordinator
description:
Som Bemanningskoordinator på Leksand Sommarland och Leksand Resort ansvarar du över att bemanningen ständigt motsvarar verksamheternas aktuella behov. Genom en nära och kontinuerlig dialog med ansvariga chefer och arbetsledare säkerställer du att rätt personal finns på rätt plats vid rätt tid. Rollen kräver att du är lösningsfokuserad och trygg i att hantera snabba förändringar – exempelvis vid sjukfrånvaro, vakanser eller andra oförutsedda händelser. Du agerar snabbt och effektivt för att fylla luckor i schemat med lämpliga medarbetare, samtidigt som du anpassar bemanningen utifrån faktorer som gästantal, väderförhållanden m.m.
  
Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter
  
Ta emot sjukanmälningar och tillsätta ersättare för både Leksand Sommarland och Leksand Resort camping
  
Optimera bemanningen i parken och på campingen genom att löpande stämma av behovet och i samråd med ansvarig chef genomföra aktuella förflyttningar alternativt ringa in extrapersonal
  
Löpande kommunikation med Teamleaders och ansvariga chefer gällande schemaförändringar kopplade till sjukfall, ersättare och förflyttningar
  
Ta emot och hantera ledighetsansökningar samt godkänna eventuella ersättare
  
Publicera och tillsätta lediga arbetspass
  
Aktivt arbeta med optimering och effektivisering av scheman
  
Rapportering av arbetstimmar, uppföljning samt attestering av tider i vårt schema- och lönesystem
  
Publicera aktuell information i vår personalapp
  
  

Din profil
  
För att lyckas som Bemanningskoordinator hos oss är du en positiv och initiativtagande lagspelare som alltid möter kollegor och gäster med ett leende. Du är kommunikativ, stresstålig och trivs med att arbeta självständigt samtidigt som du har en god samarbetsförmåga. Du är driven och nyfiken i ditt arbete. Erfarenhet av liknande arbete är meriterande, likaså tidigare arbete i personalsystemet Caspeco Cloud. Vi ser gärna att du studerar Personal och Arbetsliv eller annan relevant utbildning. Det är även meriterande om du har god kunskap om kollektivavtalet Visita-HRF Gröna riksavtalet. Då tjänsten innebär mycket muntlig och skriftlig kontakt krävs att du talar och skriver obehindrad svenska och engelska.
  
Vad kan vi erbjuda?
  
Varje dag hos oss bjuder på nya äventyr, där vi tillsammans skapar minnesvärda upplevelser för både gäster och varandra. Anställningen är en säsongsanställning på 100%, preliminärt under perioden 25 maj-16 augusti. Du arbetar 5 dagar/vecka, vardagar och helger. Lön och övriga villkor enligt kollektivavtal med Visita-Unionen.
  
Om oss Nöjesparken Leksand Sommarland i Dalarna är ett riktigt äventyr för barnfamiljer under sommaren. Innanför grindarna väntar ett stort utbud aktiviteter och attraktioner. Några av våra populäraste attraktioner är Wipeoutbanan i Siljan, Lasertag, Höghöjdsbanor för stora och små, och så förstås vårt Vattenland med tempererade pooler och vindlande vattenrutschkanor. Våra 250 sommarungdomar tar emot upp till 6000 gäster per dag.
  
Leksand Sommarland är en del av Leksand Resort AB, en ledande koncern inom Dalarnas besöksnäring. Hos oss hittar du även vår femstjärniga camping och stugby Leksand Resort, anrika Hotell & Restaurang Moskogen samt restaurang- och cateringverksamheten Mat vid Siljan. Sedan 2022 är vi en del av First Camp – Nordens största campingkoncern.

title: Legal Counsel Digital, AI and Cyber Law, Robotics
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun - leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation - for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.


This Position reports to:


Senior Legal Counsel **This role sits within ABB’s Robotics business, a leading global robotics company. We’re entering an exciting new chapter as we’ve announced the plan for SoftBank Group to acquire ABB Robotics. SoftBank is a globally recognized technology group and investor/operator focused on AI, robotics, and next-generation computing. By joining us now, you’ll be part of a pioneering team shaping the future of robotics—working alongside world-class experts in a fast-moving, innovation-driven environment.**

**Your role and responsibilities**  

  

As **Lead Counsel Digital, AI, & Cyber Law**, you will play a pivotal role in supporting the company’s digital business and transformation initiatives reporting directly to the Head of IP. You will partner with business leaders, technology teams, and group functions to provide practical legal and compliance guidance, ensuring that innovation and growth in digital solutions are underpinned by sound legal frameworks and integrity standards.  

  

The work model for the role is: hybrid #LI-hybrid  

The location for the role is flexible in Europe and US.

  

You will be mainly accountable for:

* Provide legal advice and support on digital business initiatives, including AI, cloud services, datacentre, software, licensing, and technology-driven solutions.
* Responsible for guiding the company’s digital strategy, leveraging AI and emerging technologies.
* Draft, review, and negotiate a wide range of digital and technology-related agreements with global customers, partners, and suppliers.
* Support digital transformation projects, ensuring compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and internal policies.
* Advise on intellectual property, cybersecurity, and related regulatory issues impacting digital business.
* Collaborate with global and local Legal & Integrity colleagues to ensure consistency of approach across jurisdictions.
* Monitor legal and regulatory trends in digital and technology markets, proactively identifying risks and opportunities.
* Protect the company’s reputation by ensuring operations meet ethical and compliance standards.
* Provide training and guidance to business stakeholders on legal issues relevant to digital offerings.
  

**Qualifications for the role (Mandatory)*** Qualified lawyer with 10–15 years of experience in commercial/technology law, preferably gained in a multinational corporate or top-tier law firm environment.
* Strong expertise in digital, AI, IT, cyber law, software licensing, cloud, data centre, and data protection law.
* Previous experience in Robotics sector is preferred but not required.
* Proven track record in negotiating complex technology agreements across international markets.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, able to engage effectively with senior business stakeholders.
* Pragmatic, solution-oriented, and commercially minded, with the ability to balance innovation and risk.
* Fluency in English required; additional European languages are a strong asset.
  

We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.

title: Lead/Senior Data Scientist
description:
Are you passionate about Data Science and Artificial Intelligence? Do you thrive at the intersection of technical innovation and business strategy, finding satisfaction in translating complex ideas into scalable client-centric solutions? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you.


As a **Data Scientist**, you will play a pivotal role in delivering measurable customer value by collaborating with global stakeholders to frame business problems, define success metrics and ship impactful solutions. You’ll be responsible for the full lifecycle of ML/AI products — from design and build to deployment, operation and continuous improvement. You will ensure that our models remain robust and relevant by monitoring for drift and proactively partnering with the business to optimize pipelines. Your work will be guided by the highest standards of security, governance and regulatory compliance.

**Responsibilities**

* Collaborate with global stakeholders to frame business problems and define success metrics
* Design, build, deploy and operate ML/AI products with robust CI/CD and monitoring
* Supervise models for drift and partner with business teams to optimize pipelines
* Develop solutions with security, governance and regulatory compliance in mind
* Apply advanced statistics, machine learning and experimental design to real-world challenges
* Build and refine classification, anomaly detection and reinforcement learning models for risk and fraud
* Use NLP techniques to analyze text, extract insights and flag inconsistencies
* Design, implement and deploy Generative AI solutions such as LLMs for text generation, summarization and classification
* Ensure model transparency and compliance through explainable AI (XAI) and interpretability
* Uphold software engineering best practices including code reviews, testing, reproducibility, infra-as-code and documentation

**Requirements**

* Proven experience in applied data science, machine learning and AI
* Strong background in statistics, experimental design and production ML patterns
* Hands-on expertise with classification, anomaly detection and reinforcement learning
* Experience in NLP for text analysis and insight extraction
* Experience with Generative AI models including LLMs for text generation, summarization and classification
* Knowledge of explainable AI (XAI) and model interpretability for compliance
* Demonstrated ability in anomaly detection and dynamic risk modeling
* Proficiency with Azure, Databricks, Python, SQL and Git
* Strong MLOps skills especially with Azure Pipelines and Databricks Jobs
* Experience with cloud architecture, model packaging and observability
* Commitment to high-quality code and software engineering best practices

**We offer**

* EPAM Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP)
* Company’s pension plan
* Private healthcare insurance
* Safety & life insurance
* Gym discounts
* Wellness Grant (SEK 2000)
* Corporate Programs including Employee Referral Program with rewards
* Learning and development opportunities including in-house training and coaching, professional certifications, over 22,000 courses on LinkedIn Learning Solutions and much more
* + All benefits and perks are subject to certain eligibility requirements

title: Public Sector Account Manager
description:
Public Sector Account Manager  



This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  



As an **Account Manager** at HPE, you’ll play a very important role in HPE´s success and is responsible of building the future together with our customers.


On this position, you will be leading the Account Team working with a portfolio of Public sector Customers within Swedish market. You will be responsible to position HPE’s full portfolio to our customers, together with a team of specialists.


Working at HPE, you’ll have the resources to develop your talent and creativity.


In a typical day as a **Public Sector Account Manager**, you will:

* Establish a professional, working, and consultative, relationship with the client, up to and including the C-level for Public and large Enterprise accounts, by developing a core understanding of the unique business needs of the client within their industry
* Be responsible for representing HPE’s portfolio of products and services in a concise, relevant way that resonates with customers and highlights HPE’s key
* Have focus on driving value for the client, while maximizing competitive share, revenue, and margin for HPE
* Lead complex sales engagements, project management and coordination to meet deadlines
* Typically oversee engagements with cross-BU portfolio solutions
* Build and execute a plan to drive growth and profitability across HPE's portfolio, in a structured and recurring way and maintain knowledge of competitors in account to strategically position the company's products and services better
* Develop the quota objectives and future direction for defined product category

**If you are…**

* Customer obsessed, good at partnering, innovating, and making things happen? Good start, you are aligned to our core values!
* Able to challenge with finesse
* Result-oriented
* Preferably, holding a University or Bachelor’s degree in business administration or computer science or equivalent
* Having at least 5 years of experience in the IT industry Sales and in the Account Management, Business Development or another similar Sales role
* Competent in the sale of IT services and solutions, especially datacenter technologies, Hybrid Cloud and AI (preferred)
* Vertical industry experience with the Public Sector would be preferred
* Excellent in verbal and written communication and presentation, in English and Swedish

**…You are a perfect fit!**

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health & Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal & Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Unconditional Inclusion**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

title: Marketing Manager
description:
**About Us:**  

DBtune ( www.dbune.com ) is an automated service that helps users to perform parameter tuning of database instances. DBtune simplifies this tedious and time-intensive task, allowing DB admins to focus their time elsewhere. By running optimized database instances, users end up needing fewer computing resources, reducing complexity and helping users save on cloud credits and reduce their CO2 impact. DBtune is a spin-off from Stanford University — It is grounded on 8 years of machine learning research and development in academia.
  
  

**Role Overview:**  

The Marketing Manager will play a crucial role in supporting the marketing efforts of the company while also providing personal assistance to the CEO. This dual-role position involves managing various marketing activities and providing administrative support when needed.
  
  

**About Us:**  

DBtune ( www.dbune.com ) is an automated service that helps users to perform parameter tuning of database instances. DBtune simplifies this tedious and time-intensive task, allowing DB admins to focus their time elsewhere. By running optimized database instances, users end up needing fewer computing resources, reducing complexity and helping users save on cloud credits and reduce their CO2 impact. DBtune is a spin-off from Stanford University — It is grounded on 8 years of machine learning research and development in academia.
  
  

**Role Overview:**  

The Marketing Manager will play a crucial role in supporting the marketing efforts of the company while also providing personal assistance to the CEO. This dual-role position involves managing various marketing activities and providing administrative support when needed.
  
  

**Responsibilities:****Marketing Manager (70%):****1. Messaging and Positioning:**  

Assist in refining and executing messaging and positioning strategies to effectively communicate our brand's value proposition.
  
  

**2. Website Redesign:**  

Lead the redesign of the company website, working closely with the external vendors.
  
  

**3. Content Marketing:**  

Create engaging content including videos, blogs, and other materials to support marketing campaigns and initiatives.
  
  

**4. Social Media Management:**  

Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement across various platforms.
  
  

**5. Event Support:**  

Assist in planning, organizing, and coordinating company events and trade shows.
  
  

**6. Campaigns and Webinars:**  

Collaborate with the rest of the team to execute marketing campaigns and webinars, ensuring they align with overall marketing objectives.
  
  

**7. Brand Marketing:**  

Contribute to brand-building efforts by maintaining brand consistency across all marketing materials.
  
  

**8. Demand Generation:**  

Support demand generation efforts through various marketing channels and tactics.
  
  

**9. SEO and PPC:**  

Assist in optimizing website content for search engines and manage pay-per-click advertising campaigns.
  
  

**Personal Assistant (30%):****1. Thrips:**  

Arrange travel itineraries, accommodations, and logistics for the CEO and occasionally team members.
  
  

**2. Team Offsites:**  

Plan and coordinate team offsite events to foster team-building activities and collaboration.
  
  

**3. Meeting Coordination:**  

Occasionally schedule and coordinate meetings with customers and partners.
  
  

**4. Games and Team Activities:**  

Organize team-building games and activities to promote a positive work environment.
  
  

Work environment
  
DBtune fosters a dynamic and collaborative work environment where innovation thrives. As a tight-knit team, we value diversity, embrace differences, and we are constantly committed to creating a culture, where everyone feels safe, valued, respected, and included. In our journey, we emphasize a culture of continuous learning and professional growth. We believe in the power of creativity to transform the industry, and we encourage each team member to bring their unique perspective to the table. Our team is multinational and is located on-site in Malmö.
  
Terms of employment
  
This is a permanent and full-time position, presenting significant opportunities for professional growth and development. We take pride in offering competitive salaries and a robust Swedish benefits package, ensuring our team's well-being and security. Furthermore, we are committed to investing in our team's continuous learning and skill enhancement. This commitment is exemplified through workshops and conferences, to foster personal and professional growth. In recognition of the importance of work-life balance, we provide flexible work hours.
  
Location
  
Location is flexible and exceptional EU-based candidates will be considered for remote work, however we prioritize in-office applications. The in-office position calls for regular attendance at our Malmö headquarters, providing ample opportunities for face-to-face interactions and collaboration with our team of 11. DBtune offers a flexible 2-day-a-week in-office policy. We're proud to be a part of the Minc startup incubator, which has hosted companies such as Neo4j, Polar Rose, Hövding, and Debricked.
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: Researcher in Modeling of Aerosols, Cold Clouds and Climate
description:
Lund University was founded in 1666 and is repeatedly ranked among the world’s top universities. The University has around 47 000 students and more than 8 800 staff based in Lund, Helsingborg and Malmö. We are united in our efforts to understand, explain and improve our world and the human condition. Lund University welcomes applicants with diverse backgrounds and experiences. We regard gender equality and diversity as a strength and an asset.


There is scientific uncertainty about how much climate change will occur in future for any given scenario of emissions of greenhouse gases. The reason for most of this uncertainty is that clouds are especially challenging to represent in numerical models of the atmosphere. Clouds affect the Earth’s radiation budget. Changes in their properties, either due to global warming or aerosol pollution, can strongly modify any ongoing climate change.


Most of the volume of the troposphere is subzero, where clouds contain ice. There has been controversy about initiation of ice in clouds, especially regarding the identity of aerosol species (‘ice nuclei’) initiating the first ice and the time-dependence of their activity.


The position is part of a larger collaboration between Lund in Sweden, NASA in USA and University of Oslo in Norway since 2019. This international collaborative project has performed lab observations of ice initiation from solid aerosol material, informing the design of microphysical schemes of models of clouds and climate at Lund. A new climate model is being developed to represent cloud processes with more realism in the project.


The post will involve global modeling with this new climate model at Lund to investigate mechanisms for the effect from ice nucleating aerosols on clouds and climate. Focus will be given to impacts on cloud properties and extent, which affect the Earth’s radiation budget. Thus, the post will aim to assess how long-term changes of solid aerosol loading may influence climate change.

**Work duties**


The researcher will conduct advanced numerical modeling to investigate cloud and climate processes. Key responsibilities include:

* Improving microphysics schemes in a global climate model to represent various mechanisms of ice initiation.
* Collecting and analyzing satellite and other observational data to evaluate and verify the model’s accuracy.
* Assessing the impacts of changes in ice-nucleating aerosols, including those from anthropogenic emissions, on clouds and climate.


The work will involve coding with FORTRAN 90 in a linux environment. The work will be performed in a team of atmospheric modellers at the department.

**Qualification requirements**

Requirements:

* The applicant must have a PhD degree in atmospheric science or simular.
* Applicant must have work life experience of programming in a linux environment, preferably with FORTRAN.
* Oral and written proficiency in English.
* The PhD must have involved numerical modelling.


It is desirable to have documented knowledge from their university education in:

* Mathematics, especially differential equations.
* Numerical methods and/or computer programming.
* Cloud physicsIt will be advantageous if the applicant is experienced with modeling of either clouds or climate.


In the application, applicants should provide evidence of how they meet these requirements.


Consideration will also be given to good collaborative skills and drive, and how the applicant’s experience and skills complement and strengthen ongoing research within the department, and how they stand to contribute to its future development.

**Terms of employment**


This will be a full-time fixed-term employment (SÄVA 5§ p1 LAS) of 100% for 12 month with starting date 2026-02-01 or due agreement.

**Instructions on how to apply**


Applications shall be written in English and be compiled into a PDF-file containing:

* résumé/CV, including a list of publications,
* a general description of past research and future research interests (no more than three pages),
* contact information of at least two references,
* copy of the doctoral degree certificate, and other certificates/grades that you wish to be considered.


Welcome to apply!


Within the Faculty of Science research and education is conducted within Biology, Astronomy, Physics, Geosciences, Chemistry, Mathematics and Environmental Sciences. The Faculty of Science is organized into eight departments, gathered in the northern campus area in Lund. The Faculty of Science has approximately 1500 students, 360 PhD students and 700 employees.


We kindly decline all sales and marketing contacts.

title: Head of Digital Operations
description:
Are you a strategic and people-driven IT leader with a passion for delivering reliable, secure, and future-ready digital services? ASSA ABLOY is looking for an experienced and forward-thinking Head of Digital Operations to lead our IT Operations function in the Nordics. Based in Eskilstuna, Sweden, you will ensure stable, efficient, and scalable IT services that empower our business to operate seamlessly and innovate confidently. In this role, you'll thrive in a collaborative, innovative culture that empowers you to build a career to be proud of.



You will be part of the “IT Nordics Management Team” which includes the managers of “Digital Workplace & Service Desk”, “Digital Architecture & Development” and “IT PMO” function managers.



You will be reporting to the Nordics IT Director.

  


**What you will do as our Head of Digital Operations**



As our Head of Digital Operations, you will be responsible for leading the teams that deliver high-quality Application and Infrastructure services aligned with business needs. You will ensure a stable and flexible IT environment while driving simplification, cost optimization, and operational excellence across the Nordics.



You will take ownership of both day-to-day operations and long-term digital strategies; from ensuring compliance with cybersecurity standards such as ISO27001 and NIS2, to managing key vendor partnerships and driving continuous improvement across services. You will collaborate closely with internal stakeholders as well as divisional (EMEIA) and Group IT, to align local initiatives with global direction and support seamless service delivery.



You would also:


* Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of internal and external IT professionals, based in the Nordic countries (majority in Finland and Sweden).
* Foster collaboration, engagement, and continuous growth for your IT Operations team (6-8 employees internally).
* Develop and implement digital operations strategies that support the company’s long-term business goals.
* Oversee the delivery, maintenance, and documentation of IT services to ensure reliability, scalability, and performance.
* Manage vendor and partner relationships, ensuring cost efficiency, value creation, and service quality.
* Drive and support local IT projects from concept to delivery, ensuring successful execution and alignment with business needs.

  


**The skills and experience you need**



We are looking for someone who has:


* Proven experience in IT operations, IT service management, and people leadership — ideally minimum 8 years.
* Strong knowledge of ITIL processes and practical ITSM experience.
* Experience with Microsoft 365, Azure, and ITSM tools such as ServiceNow.
* Understanding of cybersecurity and governance frameworks (ISO27001, NIS2).
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, with fluency in English and one of the Nordic languages (both spoken and written).


The ideal candidate is a strategic and analytical IT leader who thrives in complex environments and makes data-driven decisions with confidence. You combine strong problem-solving skills with a pragmatic and structured approach, balancing strategic vision with hands-on execution when needed. You are collaborative, communicative, and comfortable working across organizational boundaries to build trust and alignment. Experience with Agile or Scrum frameworks is a strong advantage, as is familiarity with cloud transformation or hybrid infrastructure environments. Fluency in a Nordic language is mandatory — what matters most is your ability to lead through influence, foster teamwork, and drive operational excellence across diverse teams and stakeholders.

  


**What we offer**



We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:


* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* A competitive salary
* Hybrid model of working
* Stable employment in a friendly international atmosphere

  


**We review applications regularly, so don't wait.**



We are building diverse and inclusive teams and encourage applications from all who can envision themselves working with us.



To ensure that your personal information is secure, we do not review any applications sent via email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, please send an email to Khalil Kabakibi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at Khalil.kabakibi@assaabloy.com.



The position requires a personal security pre-employment check in addition to a security interview and evaluation in accordance with the Swedish Protective Security Act “Säkerhetsskyddslagen” (2018:585). The personal security assessment will be conducted once the recruitment selection process is completed (before employment can be offered).



Let's together create a safer and more open world!



To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com.

  


**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**  

Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: TechOps Engineering (Identity & Device Management)
description:
*One of the Nordics leading purpose-driven global investment organization is looking for a consultant in* 
***TechOps Engineering (Identity & Device Management) t***
*o join their team. With a passion for future-proofing companies, the client has a track record of almost three decades of delivering consistent and attractive returns across multiple geographies, sectors and strategies.* 




  





**Location** 
 : Stockholm office, remote work possible.
 



  





**About the job** 




 We are looking for an experienced consultant to support EQT’s Tech Operations team during a parental leave. The role is central to ensuring that their devices, applications, and identity management run smoothly in a global and modern environment.
 



  





 EQT operates with an identity-first architecture where security, access, and user experience are driven by identity rather than the network. This is complemented by a cloud-first strategy with zero trust, modern security principles, and high availability as a foundation. Their identity environment is based on Okta combined with Entra, and experience with either platform is a plus for this role.
 



 The work includes device management via Intune and Jamf, onboarding and access management of SaaS applications, as well as technical troubleshooting in close collaboration with Tech Support.
 



 You will also operate in a hybrid environment with both Google Workspace and Microsoft 365, along with a modern collaboration platform based on Slack and Zoom, working globally, quickly, and with a strong focus on effective communication and simple user experience.
 



  





**What you'll do** 



* Managing devices and applications with Intune and Jamf
* Identity management and application access in Okta, as well as onboarding new applications (groups, access, and automation). Experience with Entra is a plus.
* Supporting Tech Support as a technical escalation point for more complex troubleshooting
* Automation and scripting (PowerShell, Bash, or similar) for maintenance and improvements
* Ensuring correct software configuration and updates
* Communicating with the global support team and coordinating issues
* Working in a modern, cloud-based IT environment with a focus on security, scalability, and good user experience



  





**Who you are** 



* At least 2–3 years of experience in IT support/Tech Operations or similar
* Experience in global and modern IT environments is a plus
* Device and application management with Intune and Jamf
* Identity management in Okta, or experience with Entra
* Scripting for automation (PowerShell, Bash, or similar)
* Understanding of cloud-based applications, SaaS environments, and identity-first architecture
* Understanding of modern security principles (zero trust, compliance, MFA, etc.)
* Self-driven and structured
* Strong communication skills in international teams
* Flexible and solution-oriented



  





**This is Market Partner** 




*Market Partner is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome to our community regardless of who you are, whom you like, no matter where you come from, or what you look like. We apply ongoing selection and may fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate.*

title: IT-arkitekt
description:
OM TJÄNSTEN
   

  

 Arbetsgivare: Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 Antal tjänster: 2
   

  

 Placeringsort: Stockholm (Sundbyberg)
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag: 19 januari 2026
   

  

 Kvalifikationer: Mångårig erfarenhet av systemutveckling i Java och arkitekturarbete. God kunskap om integrationsmönster och API-design (REST, GraphQL, eventdrivet). Förmåga att dokumentera och visualisera arkitektur, t.ex. C4-modellen eller ArchiMate. Erfarenhet av agilt arbete i stora leveransorganisationer. Mycket god svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Meriterande: Mikrotjänster och distribuerade system, CI/CD, DevOps, Docker/Kubernetes, säkerhetsarkitektur och IAM, arkitektcertifieringar (TOGAF/Azure/AWS), erfarenhet av samhällskritiska system eller offentlig sektor.
   

  

 Övrigt: Hybridarbete upp till 50 %. Säkerhetsprövning och eventuellt svenskt medborgarskap kan krävas.
   

  

 Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med ny teknik ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Som IT-arkitekt inom enheten Balanseringsapplikationer har du en strategiskt central roll där du sätter riktning för både teknik och arbetssätt. Du ingår i ett SAFe-inspirerat leveranståg och dess ledning, där du samordnar mellan flertalet utvecklingsteam, produktägare, domänarkitekter och ledning, för att säkerställa att lösningarna är robusta, skalbara och uppfyller högt ställda krav på säkerhet och driftsäkerhet.
   

  

 Du översätter verksamhets- och teknikkrav till tydlig arkitektur, visualiserar lösningar och kommunicerar dem på ett begripligt sätt till både utvecklingsteam och verksamhet. Du leder forum för tekniska ledare, sätter riktlinjer och principer, och säkerställer att utvecklingsarbetet följer en gemensam strategi.
   

  

 Systemen ni utvecklar stödjer balanseringen av den nordiska elmarknaden och ni bygger tillsammans med andra europeiska aktörer också framtidens integrerade energimarknad. Rollen ger dig möjlighet att påverka den tekniska riktningen, äga och bidra till arkitekturens vision och skapa förutsättningar för en högkvalitativ utvecklingsmiljö. Din uppgift är att tydligt visa hur saker och ting ska utvecklas framåt.
   

  

 Utöver stort mandat får du också möjlighet att fördjupa din kunskap om energimarknaden, kritiska system och hur man leder arkitektur i en växande och komplex organisation. Tillsammans säkerställer ni att Sverige varken slocknar eller stannar.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Analysera, utveckla och föreslå förbättring kring nuvarande systemarkitektur med fokus på säkerhet, prestanda och driftsäkerhet
* Ta fram och dokumentera arkitekturprinciper, riktlinjer och målbild
* Leda och samordna arkitekturforum för tekniska ledare
* Säkerställa att lösningar följer etablerade standarder, riktlinjer och målbild
* Samarbeta nära med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och förvaltningsorganisation
* Visualisera och kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar för olika målgrupper, på olika nivåer i organisationen
* Bedöma konsekvenser av tekniska val och förändringar i IT-landskapet
* Stötta teamen i att omsätta principer till konkret arbete och best practices


 Om dig
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är strategisk, strukturerad och trygg i din kompetens. Du är nyfiken, framåtlutad och analytisk, och ser helheten i komplexa utvecklingsmiljöer. Du har lätt för att samarbeta, är pedagogisk och trivs med att vägleda andra mot gemensamma mål. Vidare är du van vid att navigera i många kontaktytor och har en vilja att driva förbättringar och ta ansvar för hur utvecklingsarbetet organiseras och hålls samman.
   

  

 Du har förmågan att pendla mellan arkitektur på hög nivå och dialogen nära utvecklingsteam, i frågor som rör hur lösningar ska formas och realiseras. Oavsett format kan du strukturera och visualisera arkitektur så att den blir begriplig, användbar och leder arbetet framåt.
   

  

 Eftersom systemen är samhällskritiska är det förstås viktigt att du är kvalitets- och säkerhetsmedveten. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Skallkrav**
* Mångårig dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling (Java) och arkitekturarbete
* God kunskap om integrationsmönster och API-design (REST, GraphQL, eventdriven arkitektur)
* Förmåga att dokumentera och visualisera arkitektur (t.ex. med C4-modell eller ArchiMate)
* Erfarenhet av arbete enligt agila principer i en stor leveransorganisation bestående av flera utvecklingsteam
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har Erfarenhet Av**
* Att designa och leda arbete med mikrotjänstarkitekturer och distribuerade system
* CI/CD, DevOps-principer och containerteknologier (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Säkerhetsarkitektur och IAM
* Certifiering inom TOGAF, Azure Architect Expert, AWS Solutions Architect eller motsvarande
* Erfarenhet från samhällskritiska system eller 24/7-driftmiljöer
* Arbete i offentlig sektor eller inom energisektorn


 Bra att veta
   

  

* Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm (Sundbyberg)
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Sista ansökningsdag är 2026-01-19. Vi använder urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Svenska kraftnät med Computer Sweden Recruitment. För frågor kring tjänsten och rekryteringsprocessen, välkommen att kontakta huvudansvarig rekryteringskonsult Alexandra Tihinen, telefon 070-447 92 24 eller alexandra.tihinen@csrecruitment.se. Det går också bra att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare hos Svenska kraftnät Maria Sahlén, 010-489 20 27 (maria.sahlen2@svk.se).
   

  

 Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010-475 87 72 och och Erica Midfjäll, ST, 010-475 87 31. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
   

  

 Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning
   

  

 Svenska Kraftnät Arbetar För Att Främja Mångfald Och Motverka Diskriminering Och Ser Gärna Sökanden Med Olika Bakgrund Och Erfarenheter Till Våra Rekryteringar. Lär Känna Svenska Kraftnät Och Hur Det Är Att Arbeta Hos Oss
   

  

 Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 ANSÖK HÄR

title: Solutions Architect
description:
**Job Title: Solution Architect** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden - Hybrid: 2-3 Days to Office Every Week** 




**Duration: 3 Months - Can Extend** 




**Employment Type: Contract B2B** 




  





**Roles & Responsibilities:** 



* Solution Architect should have a strong background in Snowflake, Process Mining, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and Analytics.
* Responsible for designing and delivering innovative data solutions that drive business transformation and value.
* Proven experience as a Solution Architect in data, analytics, or AI domains.
* Hands-on expertise in Snowflake data warehousing and architecture.
* Practical experience in Process Mining tools (e.g., Celonis, UiPath Process Mining).
* Strong knowledge of AI/ML frameworks and analytics platforms (e.g., Python, TensorFlow, Azure ML, Databricks).
* Experience in ERP: SAP S4 & SAP GTS
* Experience designing and implementing large-scale data solutions.
* Excellent understanding of data modeling, ETL/ELT, and data integration.
* Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.
